DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Sleep Disturbance Sleep109 Past 7 Days Sleep Quality Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated response of the quality of their sleep in the past 7 days, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Sleep Disturbance Subordinate Domain Past Week Sleep Quality Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess perceptions of sleep quality, sleep depth, and restoration associated with sleep; perceived difficulties and concerns with getting to sleep or staying asleep; and perceptions of the adequacy of and satisfaction with sleep._The most recent week, including today._A question about an individual's sleep quality._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Sleep Disturbance Subordinate Domain
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.:The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess perceptions of sleep quality, sleep depth, and restoration associated with sleep; perceived difficulties and concerns with getting to sleep or staying asleep; and perceptions of the adequacy of and satisfaction with sleep.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess perceptions of sleep quality, sleep depth, and restoration associated with sleep; perceived difficulties and concerns with getting to sleep or staying asleep; and perceptions of the adequacy of and satisfaction with sleep.

Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about an individual's sleep quality.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about an individual's sleep quality.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS items that describes a range of subjective scores for representing the quality of something an individual experiences from 1: Very good, to 5: Very poor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that something has a high degree of quality, value or worth.

Concepts.definition: An indication that something has a high degree of quality, value or worth.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Valuable or useful or agreeable or pleasing.

Concepts.definition: Valuable or useful or agreeable or pleasing.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2023.1.11 Alt VM Name added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Having no exceptional quality or ability.

Concepts.definition: Having no exceptional quality or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Of especially low value or worth.

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
